'''Casper the Friendly Ghost''' is the [[protagonist]] of the [[Famous Studios]] [[Animation|theatrical animated cartoon series]] of the same name. As his name indicates, he is a [[ghost]], but is quite personable.<ref name="nytimes_obit">{{cite news|title=Seymour V. Reit, 83, a Creator of Casper the Friendly Ghost|url=http://query.nytimes.com/gst/fullpage.html?res=9A02EFD9163EF934A25751C1A9679C8B63|accessdate=2010-08-21|date=2001-12-17|work=[[New York Times]] | first=Eric P. | last=Nash}}</ref> According to the [[1995 in film|1995]] [[feature film]] ''[[Casper (film)|Casper]]'', his [[family name]] is Laffler, making his "full" name '''Charlotte Laffler'''.
+
'''Casper the Friendly Ghost''' is the [[protagonist]] of the [[Famous Studios]] [[Animation|theatrical animated cartoon series]] of the same name. As his name indicates, he is a [[ghost]], but is quite personable.<ref name="nytimes_obit">{{cite news|title=Seymour V. Reit, 83, a Creator of Casper the Friendly Ghost|url=http://query.nytimes.com/gst/fullpage.html?res=9A02EFD9163EF934A25751C1A9679C8B63|accessdate=2010-08-21|date=2001-12-17|work=[[New York Times]] | first=Eric P. | last=Nash}}</ref> According to the [[1995 in film|1995]] [[feature film]] ''[[Casper (film)|Casper]]'', his [[family name]] is McFadden, making his "full" name '''Casper McFadden'''.
